text: Nivigne et Suran is a commune in the Ain department in the Auvergne-Rhône- Alpes region of east France. It started on January 1, 2017 and has the former communes of Chavannes-sur-Suran and Germagnat in it. Arrêté préfectoral 20 May 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ain
title: Nivigne et Suran
